EmailTemplate.name: LMS Due Date Passed Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Library Item {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Library_Item_Name__c} Due Date passed Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi, Due Date for Item {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Library_Item__r.Name} has Passed its Due date {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Expected_Return_Date__c} Please return the Book with due amount {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Fine__c}
